properties.areaDesc: Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI; St Ignace to False Detour Channel; Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge including Mackinac Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 9:59AM EST until January 8 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 30 kt and highest waves around 8
feet.

* WHERE...Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge
including Mackinac Island, St Ignace to False Detour Channel
and Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
